issue.description:
The entity Work_order and Directed_activity are circular: they each refer to the other one.
At least, one of the references have to be replaced by an inverse attribute.
Preferably, Work_order.directed_activity should be replaced by:
Inverse controlled_activity:SET[1:?] OF Directed_activity as directive;
We need a capability to record the "reason" for a change. Is this the reason that a version has gone from one version to the next? Or the justification for the work_order?
